item.title: 阿布扎比 ADQ 资产四年翻番后计划下一步行动
item.description:
酋长国最新成立的财富基金的增长速度超过了许多同行。高管们正在寻找利用这一势头的方法。【原文：

The emirate’s newest wealth fund is growing faster than many of its peers. Executives are now looking for ways to take advantage of that momentum.

】

item.title: Uber 为老年人推出更简洁的界面，抢先 Lyft 进入市场
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. launched a simpler version of its rideshare app to make it easier for older adults to get around, the latest move in its tit-for-tat rivalry with Lyft Inc., which plans to launch a similar feature later this year.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会安娜-戈麦斯为媒体辩护，与特朗普针锋相对
item.description:
她很快就会成为该委员会中唯一的民主党人，该委员会支持总统对媒体采取好斗的立场。【原文：

She’ll soon be the lone Democrat on the commission, which is supporting the president’s combative stance against the media.

】

item.title: 与特朗普挂钩的稳定币被用于 MGX 的 20 亿美元 Binance 交易
item.description: 特朗普家族的去中心化金融项目--世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）表示，其新的稳定币被用于阿布扎比 MGX 对加密货币交易所 Binance 控股有限公司的 20 亿美元投资。【原文：World Liberty Financial, the Trump family’s decentralized finance project, said its new stablecoin was used for a $2 billion investment in crypto exchange Binance Holdings Ltd. by Abu Dhabi’s MGX.】

item.title: 关税动荡影响盈利周期，选股者陷入困境
item.description: 全球贸易忧虑正在刺激美国股市步调一致地波动，这让试图战胜本已变幻莫测的市场的选股人头疼不已。【原文：Global trade worries are spurring lockstep moves in US equities, a headache for stock pickers trying to beat an already unpredictable market.】

item.title: 以关税为焦点的财报测试为苹果混乱的一个月画上句号
item.description: 苹果公司股价在上个月因关税引发的历史性大跌中收复了大部分失地，但这并不意味着投资者就可以高枕无忧了。【原文：Apple Inc. shares have clawed back a good portion of the ground they lost in the historic tariff-induced selloff last month, but that doesn’t mean investors are in the clear.】

item.title: 西班牙 Cirsa 公司发行 PIK 债券，对风险偏好进行新一轮测试
item.description: 西班牙博彩公司 Cirsa 正计划发行新的实物支付拨动票据，这种票据允许发行人选择将利息支付推迟到最后到期日。【原文：Spanish gaming company Cirsa is planning to issue new payment-in-kind toggle notes, a type of debt that gives issuers the option to delay interest payments until the final maturity date.】

item.title: 马斯克称能源与环境部 "一定要 "审查美联储成本
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）表示，他正在考虑向美联储派遣他的政府效率团队，并以美联储华盛顿总部耗资巨大的翻修工程为例，说明政府可能存在浪费现象。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said he is considering sending his government efficiency team to the Federal Reserve, citing a costly renovation of the central bank’s Washington, DC, headquarters as an example of potential government waste.】

item.title: Palantir 的情报收集车被军队评为优胜产品
item.description: Palantir 科技公司为美国陆军设计的新型移动战场情报收集车和拖车被美国陆军领导人评为表现最佳的项目之一。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc.’s new mobile battlefield intelligence-gathering vehicle and trailer for the US Army is ranked by its leaders as among their top-performing programs, according to a new assessment by the service.】

item.title: 调查显示：消失的中国商品将冲击毫无准备的市场
item.description: MLIV Pulse 最新调查显示，来自中国的商品流通放缓凸显了关税给美国经济带来的风险，投资者将在未来几周内遭受冲击。【原文：Investors are in for a shock in the next few weeks as the slowing flow of goods from China underscores the risks tariffs bring to the US economy, the latest MLIV Pulse survey showed.】

item.title: Ocado 的债券总支出将是去年的三倍
item.description: 在奥卡多集团（Ocado Group Plc）完成最新债券的销售后，该公司的年利息支出总额可能接近 1 亿英镑（1.34 亿美元），是去年同期的三倍多。【原文：After Ocado Group Plc finalizes the sale of its latest bond, the company’s total annual interest bill may be close to £100 million ($134 million) — more than triple what it was paying this time last year.】

item.title: 英国 3 月抵押贷款批准量下滑，因为时间紧迫，赶不上加税的步伐
item.description: 英国 3 月份的抵押贷款批准量连续第三个月下降，原因是在 4 月初房产交易税开始征收之前，购房者已经没有时间来办理购房手续了。【原文：UK mortgage approvals fell for a third month in March as house hunters ran out of time to tie up purchases before a property transaction tax went up at the start of April.】

item.title: 关税冲击下出口枯竭，英国制造业萎缩
item.description: 一项受到密切关注的调查显示，由于全球贸易战的爆发削弱了来自美国、欧洲和中国的需求，英国工厂受到了五年来海外订单最大跌幅的打击。【原文：UK factories were hit by the biggest plunge in overseas orders in five years as a global trade war outbreak sapped demand from the US, Europe and China, according to a closely watched survey.】

item.title: 尽管推出了新款 Y 型车，特斯拉在法国的销量仍降至两年来的最低点
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Tesla Inc. registered only 863 new vehicles in France last month, its lowest total in more than two years, even as the carmaker ramped up production of its most popular model.】

item.title: 里约在激进投资者终止双重上市的推动下幸存下来
item.description: 一位激进投资者试图迫使力拓集团审查其双重上市结构，但由于没有足够多的股东支持该提议，力拓集团躲过了这一劫。【原文：Rio Tinto Group survived an attempt by an activist investor to force it to review its dual listing structure, with not enough shareholders backing the proposal.】

item.title: 收益黯淡，富时100指数终止2017年以来最佳连胜势头
item.description: 由于一系列令人失望的财报，伦敦富时 100 指数走低，结束了 2017 年以来最长的连涨势头。【原文：London’s FTSE 100 edged lower, snapping its longest gaining streak since 2017, on a slate of disappointing earnings.】

item.title: 第一季度客户抛弃股票，施罗德资产下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普 4 月 2 日宣布加征关税前的市场波动，客户纷纷撤出股票和多元资产基金，施罗德公司（Schroders Plc）的资产在第一季度出现下降。【原文：Schroders Plc assets dropped in the first quarter as clients pulled out of equities and multi-asset funds amid market volatility in the lead up to US President Donald Trump’s tariff announcement on April 2.】

item.title: 英国国家电网首席执行官佩蒂格鲁将于 11 月卸任
item.description: 约翰-佩蒂格鲁（John Pettigrew）将在担任英国富时 100 指数公司国家电网公司（National Grid Plc）首席执行官近 10 年后卸任。【原文：John Pettigrew will step down from his role as chief executive officer of UK FTSE 100 company National Grid Plc after almost 10 years.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）下调海湾石油生产国的增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织以全球贸易紧张局势升级和能源价格下跌为由，下调了包括沙特阿拉伯和伊拉克在内的中东和北非石油出口国的经济增长预期。【原文：The International Monetary Fund downgraded its growth forecasts for oil exporting countries in the Middle East and North Africa, including Saudi Arabia and Iraq, citing escalating global trade tensions and lower energy prices.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称埃及在放宽利率方面应保持警惕
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高关税带来的全球不确定性，埃及在降低利率时应谨慎行事。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said Egypt should tread carefully as it lowers interest rates, due to global uncertainty wrought by US President Donald Trump’s tariff raises.】

item.title: 澳大利亚反对党承诺将预算提高 90 亿澳元
item.description: 反对党经济发言人在公布削减官僚机构和取消工党政府减税计划时表示，在自由党-国民联盟政府执政的四年内，澳大利亚的预算底线将提高约 140 亿澳元（90 亿美元）。【原文：Australia’s budget bottom line will be improved by about A$14 billion ($9 billion) over four years under a Liberal-National Coalition government, the opposition’s economic spokespeople said as they unveiled plans to cut the bureaucracy and scrap the Labor government’s tax cuts.】

item.title: 沙特开放 ABS 市场的关键规则变化 "比西班牙还大
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯正在提议进行改革，以鼓励发行资产担保证券，并启动一个参与者认为有可能比许多欧洲国家规模更大的市场。【原文：Saudi Arabia is proposing changes that will encourage the issuance of asset-backed securities and kick start a market that participants say has the potential to be larger than many European countries.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，预计价格目标将在晚些时候实现
item.description: 在美国关税措施导致不确定性加剧的情况下，日本央行维持基准利率不变，同时推迟了实现通胀目标的预期时间。【原文：The Bank of Japan left its benchmark rate unchanged while pushing back the timing for when it expects to reach its inflation target amid intensified uncertainties due to US tariff measures.】

item.title: 日本央行在关税不确定性中坚持立场后日元走低
item.description: 在美国关税带来的不确定性加剧之际，日本央行维持利率稳定，日元兑美元下跌。【原文：The yen fell against the dollar after the Bank of Japan kept its rates steady amid heightened uncertainty from US tariffs.】

item.title: 关税阴影笼罩，日本央行维持利率不变
item.description: 鉴于美国关税带来的不确定性，市场普遍预期日本央行行长上田一夫不会加息，日本央行维持基准利率不变。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged amid widespread market expectations that Governor Kazuo Ueda wouldn’t raise rates given the uncertainty stemming from US tariffs.】

item.title: 受关税影响前景黯淡 村田制作所股价创 2000 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: iPhone零部件制造商村田制作所（Murata Manufacturing Co.【原文：Shares of iPhone components maker Murata Manufacturing Co. plunged 18% — the most in 25 years — after it said it’s bracing for a profit decline and warned the impact of tariffs was not yet fully priced in.】
